title: Login with Google OAuth success
description: Verify that a user can successfully log in using Google OAuth authentication.

steps.description: Navigate to login page
Click on 'Login with Google' button
Complete Google OAuth flow with valid account
Verify user is logged in and redirected correctly

title: Login with Email and Password success
description: Verify that a user can successfully log in using valid email and password credentials.

steps.description: Navigate to login page
Enter valid email and password
Click login button
Verify user is logged in and redirected correctly

title: Login with Phone OTP success
description: Verify user can log in via OTP received on phone and complete authentication flow successfully.

steps.description: Navigate to login page
Select phone OTP authentication
Enter valid phone number
Request OTP and enter the received OTP
Verify user is logged in successfully

title: Login failure with invalid credentials
description: Ensure login is rejected with an error message when user provides invalid email or password.

steps.description: Navigate to login page
Enter invalid email or password
Click login button
Observe error message displayed and user remains logged out

title: Guest mode access and restrictions
description: Verify users can enter the platform in guest mode with limited features as specified.

steps.description: Navigate to login page
Select guest mode option
Verify user gains access with guest privileges
Verify user cannot access restricted functions such as creating offers

title: Create a new request using AI Assistant
description: Validate that users can create a service request using the AI-powered assistant successfully.

steps.description: Log in as authenticated user
Navigate to create request page
Use AI Assistant to generate request details
Review and submit the request
Verify new request is created and visible in user's requests list

title: Edit existing request
description: Ensure users can edit and save updates to existing requests properly.

steps.description: Log in and navigate to user's requests
Select a request to edit
Modify request details and save
Verify changes are persisted and reflected in request details

title: Archive and unarchive a request
description: Verify the user can archive a request and later restore (unarchive) it successfully.

steps.description: Navigate to a request owned by user
Archive the request
Verify request is removed from active listings
Unarchive the request
Verify request is visible again in active listings

title: Hide and bump a request
description: Ensure user can hide requests from marketplace and use bump feature to raise priority listing.

steps.description: Navigate to user's active request
Hide the request
Verify request is not visible in marketplace
Unhide and use bump feature on request
Verify request moved higher in list priority

title: Browse marketplace requests with filters
description: Verify that marketplace requests can be filtered properly by category, city, budget, and view mode.

steps.description: Navigate to marketplace page
Apply category filter
Verify displayed requests belong to selected category
Apply city filter
Verify requests match selected city
Set budget range filter
Verify requests fall within budget range
Switch view modes (all, interests)
Verify requests listed correspond to selected view mode

title: Create and submit an offer on a request
description: Test that a provider user can create an offer on a marketplace request using quick form or AI assistant and submit it successfully.

steps.description: Log in as provider user
Browse requests and select one
Open offer creation form (quick or AI assisted)
Fill offer details and submit
Verify offer is created and visible in offers list

title: Edit and archive offers
description: Verify users can edit their offers and archive/unarchive offers as needed.

steps.description: Navigate to user's offers
Select an offer and modify details
Save changes
Verify offer updates are saved
Archive the offer
Verify offer is removed from active lists
Unarchive the offer
Verify offer is restored

title: Real-time messaging between requester and provider
description: Ensure messages are sent and received instantly between requester and provider in the chat interface with file exchange supported.

steps.description: Log in as requester and open conversation with provider
Send text message
Verify provider receives the message in real-time
Send file attachment in chat
Verify provider receives and can download file
Verify real-time notification appears on provider side

title: Receive real-time notifications with correct sound alerts
description: Validate that the user receives in-app notifications in real-time with distinct sound alerts per notification type and accurate unread count badge.

steps.description: Trigger an event generating a notification (e.g., new offer, new message)
Verify notification shows immediately in notifications panel
Verify the specific sound for the notification type plays
Verify unread notification count badge increments correctly

title: User profile preferences update
description: Verify user can update settings such as theme (dark/light), language selection (Arabic, English, Urdu), and interests with changes persisting correctly.

steps.description: Navigate to user profile settings
Change theme to dark mode
Verify UI switches to dark mode
Switch language to Arabic
Verify interface text updates and RTL layout activates
Manage and save interests
Verify interests saved and reflected in marketplace filters

title: Multi-language interface support and RTL layout
description: Ensure interface supports all three languages (Arabic, English, Urdu) correctly and applies RTL layout for Arabic and Urdu.

steps.description: Switch UI language to Arabic
Verify all texts translate and layout is RTL
Switch UI language to Urdu
Verify all texts translate and layout is RTL
Switch UI language to English
Verify all texts translate to English and layout is LTR

title: Category management and color coding localized
description: Verify categories appear with proper localized names and colors in filters and listings.

steps.description: Open marketplace filters
Verify category names appear correctly in selected language
Verify category colors match specification
Select category filter and verify category-related requests shown

title: Location search with Google Maps integration
description: Verify city search and autocomplete function works correctly using Google Maps API and results filter requests accordingly.

steps.description: Navigate to marketplace
Enter partial city name in location search
Verify autocomplete suggestions appear with correct places
Select a city suggestion
Verify requests displayed are filtered to the selected city

title: Security - Prevent unauthorized access to user data
description: Verify the system blocks access to personal requests, offers, messages, and settings for unauthorized users.

steps.description: Attempt to access user profile or requests without logging in
Verify access denied and redirect to login
Attempt to access other users' requests or offers via URL direct access
Verify access denied or appropriate error shown

title: Performance - Page load and response time under normal and high load
description: Test that application pages load within acceptable times and remain stable under high concurrent user load.

steps.description: Measure page load time of main pages (login, marketplace, request creation)
Verify load times meet performance targets (<3 seconds)
Simulate multiple concurrent users browsing and interacting
Verify system remains responsive without errors or timeouts

title: Error handling - Display global error boundary fallback UI
description: Confirm that unexpected errors in UI components trigger global error boundary and display fallback user-friendly message.

steps.description: Cause a component error (e.g., force a null reference exception)
Verify global error boundary catches and displays fallback UI
Verify user-friendly error message appears without app crash

title: File upload and storage for messaging attachments
description: Verify users can upload files as attachments in messages and that files are stored and retrievable correctly.

steps.description: In chat, upload a file attachment
Verify file uploads without error and is stored
Send attachment in message and receive on other end
Verify attachment can be downloaded/previewed by recipient

title: Routing and deep linking supports direct navigation
description: Validate that client-side routing works properly, deep links load correct views and states.

steps.description: Use direct URL to open marketplace with filters applied
Verify correct filtered view loads
Use deep link to open specific request detail page
Verify correct request details are displayed

title: Onboarding flow for first-time users
description: Ensure first-time users are guided through onboarding screens before accessing core functionality.

steps.description: Register new user and log in for the first time
Verify onboarding screen sequence is presented
Complete onboarding steps
Verify onboarding finishes and main app is accessible

title: Haptic feedback on mobile devices
description: Validate that mobile users receive haptic feedback on key interactions like button press and notifications.

steps.description: On a supported device, perform UI interactions that trigger haptic feedback
Verify haptic feedback is triggered appropriately and consistently
